content:
Healthy Travel - Dr. Thorsten Onno Bender in our studio
The specialist for flight medicine and internal medicine provides you with tips on tackling motion sickness and jet lag and tells us which pre-holiday vaccinations make sense.
Flight Medicine Unit, Charité University Hospital, Berlin Campus Virchow Clinic Augustenburger Platz 1 13353 Berlin http://www.fliegerarzt-berlin.de/
